<h3 id="X38109">X(38109) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(3), X(4), X(12)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (3*b^2+2*b*c+3*c^2)*a^5-(b+c)*(3*b^2+2*b*c+3*c^2)*a^4-2*(3*b^4+3*c^4-b*c*(b+c)^2)*a^3+2*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*(3*b^2+4*b*c+3*c^2)*a^2+(b^2-c^2)^2*(3*b^2-4*b*c+3*c^2)*a-3*(b^2-c^2)^3*(b-c)  :  :
<br>
<b>
X(38109) = X(3)-4*X(6668) = X(4)+2*X(31659) = 2*X(5)+X(12) = 4*X(5)-X(26470) = 2*X(12)+X(26470) = X(119)+2*X(8068) = X(355)+2*X(37737) = 4*X(5901)-X(37734) = 5*X(8227)+X(37710) = 2*X(21155)-3*X(38070) = X(21155)+3*X(38078) = X(21155)-6*X(38085) = X(21155)+2*X(38142) = 2*X(38045)+X(38157) = X(38070)+2*X(38078) = X(38070)-4*X(38085) = 3*X(38070)-4*X(38114) = 3*X(38070)+4*X(38142) = X(38078)+2*X(38085) = 3*X(38078)+2*X(38114) = 3*X(38078)-2*X(38142)
</b>
<p>
X(38109) lies on these lines: {1,5}, {3,6668}, {4,31659}, {30,21155}, {140,30264}, {329,6829}, {381,5842}, {442,11231}, {511,38148}, {515,38033}, {516,6842}, {517,17530}, {529,5055}, {542,38091}, {547,31157}, {758,10175}, {908,9956}, {971,38125}, {1503,38120}, {1512,9955}, {1656,4999}, {2475,34474}, {2476,5657}, {2800,38219}, {2829,38135}, {2975,3090}, {3091,11491}, {3564,38169}, {3628,5251}, {3814,5745}, {3822,6882}, {3829,10247}, {3850,18406}, {4930,5790}, {4996,6946}, {5056,20060}, {5690,17057}, {5692,38042}, {5731,6830}, {5762,38153}, {5840,17577}, {5843,38174}, {5844,38178}, {5849,14561}, {5852,38107}, {5857,38108}, {5885,12691}, {6831,28160}, {6859,10590}, {6860,18761}, {6862,10895}, {6863,10894}, {6867,10588}, {6871,11248}, {6874,11681}, {6879,10269}, {6933,10599}, {6941,9779}, {6971,25466}, {6980,7680}, {10267,10585}, {11929,26363}, {15908,28212}, {17757,38176}, {18412,38041}, {21617,38056}, {25639,28234}, {28194,38105}, {28204,38027}, {31479,37820}</p>
<p>
X(38109) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {5587, 37701}, {38039, 38058}, {38062, 38162}, {38114, 38142}, {38160, 38206}<br>
X(38109) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (21155, 38114), (38033, 38062), (38058, 38183), (38125, 38206), (38129, 38058)<br>
X(38109) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (5, 12, 26470), (5, 5886, 23513), (5, 5901, 7173), (5, 7951, 119), (5, 10592, 355), (12, 7173, 37734), (5219, 7951, 10592), (6867, 10588, 11499), (6933, 10599, 11249), (10592, 37737, 12), (21155, 38114, 38070), (38039, 38183, 38129), (38078, 38085, 38070), (38085, 38142, 38114)<br>
</p>
